comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
One of the former Project EXTRAVERSION YP-80As, serial 44-83028. Along with serial 44-83029, both birds had been deployed to Italy in the closing months of the war for operational testing - NO COMBAT.

A curiosity why he depicted the fuselage sash in blue on this art, rather than red as depicted in all the others... EUREKA! It turns out the flyby was done in ship 029 - similarly marked, but with blue stripes for easier recognition from a distance, to distinguish her from 028...
